701719f-a.title: Bronx: Rochelle Street - City Island Avenue
701719f-a.text:
Rochelle Street (City Island), at the N.W. corner of City Island
Ave.
July 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
701719f-a.folder: Rochelle Street & City Island Avenue, Bronx, NY

701719f-b.title: Bronx: Rochelle Street - City Island Avenue
701719f-b.text:
Rochelle Street (City Island), at the N.W. corner of City Island
Ave.
July 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
701719f-b.folder: Rochelle Street & City Island Avenue, Bronx, NY

700765f-c.title: Bronx: City Island Avenue - Rochelle Street
700765f-c.text:
(1)
City Island Ave. (City Island), west side, south of Rochelle
Street, showing the Chateau Laurier. Beers' map of 1868 indicates it
to have been the home of S.D. Horton, one of the early settlers of the
island.
July 26, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, showing a complete front view as seen from the dock at
the foot of City Island Ave.
July 26, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The same, at a later date, as seen from the park in front of the
chateau. It is now (1937) the home of the City Island Athletic Club.
July 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
700765f-c.folder: City Island Avenue & Rochelle Street, Bronx, NY

700742f-a.title: Bronx: City Island Avenue - Rochelle Street
700742f-a.text:
33 to 39 City Island Ave. (City Island), south of, adjoining, and
at the S.W. corner of Rochelle Street. (The 1-story shanty, on the
extreme right, is at the N.W. corner of the aforementioned street).
July 26, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
